solution_line_template: So Bailey had {bailey_left_with} + {bailey_gave_total} = <<{bailey_left_with}+{bailey_gave_total}={bailey_initial}>>{bailey_initial} bands in the beginning.
Justine had {bailey_initial} + {justine_more_than_bailey} = <<{bailey_initial}+{justine_more_than_bailey}={justine_initial}>>{justine_initial} bands in the beginning.
Thus, Ylona had {justine_initial} + {ylona_more_than_justine} = <<{justine_initial}+{ylona_more_than_justine}={ylona_initial}>>{ylona_initial} bands in the beginning.
